headline: Winter Storm Fern Puts Spotlight on NFL Playoffs, Lifts Betting Volume Expectations
summary: Millions staying indoors during severe U.S. weather could drive higher NFL viewership and increased sports betting and prediction market activity.

raw.headline: Winter Storm Fern Puts Spotlight on NFL Playoffs, Lifts Betting Volume Expectations
raw.summary: Millions staying indoors during severe U.S. weather could drive higher NFL viewership and increased sports betting and prediction market activity.

headline: FOX SPORTS UNVEILS HISTORIC FIFA WORLD CUP 2026™ BROADCAST SCHEDULE
summary: FOX Sports, America's English-language home for the FIFA World Cup 2026™, today unveiled its historic broadcast schedule for this year's highly anticipated global sporting event. From Thursday, June 11 through Sunday, July 19, 2026, FOX Sports will offer a monumental 340 hours of first-run programming, a 100-hour increase over FIFA World Cup 2022™, with an updated record 70-matches presented on FOX network television — more than double the matches in 2022.
